page.title: 19SECONDARY SCHOOL:Buildings
page.content: Upper Floor:- The upper floor contains the{ {community centre ,}viewing gallery,the offices,medical & waiting rooms ,library,staff quiet room & sixth form common room,kitchens, dining hall & {Drama studio},the{ Humanities }the{ {English},{Computing}, Careers & Remedial rooms. Ground Floor & Lower ground floor :- The ground floor contains the sports hall,multi-gym, changing rooms ,various storerooms,{Maths,Languages {,Sciences and Music}rooms. The lower ground floor houses the{art {,DCT,Home Economics and Textiles {rooms. The school is situated in spacious and landscaped grounds with{rugby, {football,hockey,netball,cricket,tennis {and all-weather pitches. { }
